${modID}:ProtectiveSpikes.NAME: Protective Spikes
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked, deal #b3 damage back. Wears off upon exiting #yThorns.

${modID}:Corrosion.NAME: Corrosion
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, lose #b
At the start of its turn, loses #b

${modID}:AlchemicalProwessPower.NAME: Alchemical Prowess
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #yAttack will apply #yCorrosion equal to the unblocked damage dealt.
#yAttacks will apply #yCorrosion equal to the unblocked damage dealt.
